metadata.title: CVE-2020-12866 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference in SANE Backends before 1.0.30 allows amalicious device connected to the same local network as the victim to causea denial of service, GHSL-2020-079.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12866` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsane - 1.0.29-0ubuntu5.1
libsane-common - 1.0.29-0ubuntu5.1
libsane1 - 1.0.29-0ubuntu5.1
sane-utils - 1.0.29-0ubuntu5.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sane-backends package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.29-0ubuntu5.1').
